cherish ball.name: Cherish Ball
cherish ball.description: A quite rare PokÃ© Ball that has been crafted in order to commemorate a special occasion of some sort.

premier ball.name: Premier Ball
premier ball.description: A somewhat rare PokÃ© Ball that was made as a commemorative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.

amaze mulch.name: Amaze Mulch
amaze mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

black flute.name: Black Flute
black flute.description: A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to encounter strong PokÃ©mon in the place you use it.

blue flute.name: Blue Flute
blue flute.description: A flute made from blue glass that awakens sleeping PokÃ©mon.

boost mulch.name: Boost Mulch
boost mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

common stone.name: Common Stone
common stone.description: A perfectly normal stone that might appear to be valuable to some. It&#8217;s all in the eye of the beholder.

damp mulch.name: Damp Mulch
damp mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

fluffy tail.name: Fluffy Tail
fluffy tail.description: A toy that attracts the attention of a PokÃ©mon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild PokÃ©mon.

gooey mulch.name: Gooey Mulch
gooey mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

growth mulch.name: Growth Mulch
growth mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

odd keystone.name: Odd Keystone
odd keystone.description: A vital item that is needed to keep a stone tower from collapsing. Voices can be heard from it occasionally.

red flute.name: Red Flute
red flute.description: A flute made from red glass that snaps PokÃ©mon out of infatuation.

rich mulch.name: Rich Mulch
rich mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

shoal salt.name: Shoal Salt
shoal salt.description: Salt that you found inside Shoal Cave.

shoal shell.name: Shoal Shell
shoal shell.description: A seashell that you found inside Shoal Cave.

stable mulch.name: Stable Mulch
stable mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

surprise mulch.name: Surprise Mulch
surprise mulch.description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

white flute.name: White Flute
white flute.description: A flute made from white glass. It makes it easier to encounter weak PokÃ©mon in the place you use it.

yellow flute.name: Yellow Flute
yellow flute.description: A flute made from yellow glass that snaps PokÃ©mon out of confusion.

claw fossil.name: Claw Fossil
claw fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It appears to be a fragment of a claw.

dome fossil.name: Dome Fossil
dome fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It could be a shell or carapace.

helix fossil.name: Helix Fossil
helix fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It might be a piece of a seashell.

jaw fossil.name: Jaw Fossil
jaw fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.

old amber.name: Old Amber
old amber.description: A piece of amber that still contains the genetic material of an ancient PokÃ©mon. It&#8217;s clear with a tawny, reddish tint.

root fossil.name: Root Fossil
root fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It looks as if it could be part of a plant&#8217;s root.

sail fossil.name: Sail Fossil
sail fossil.description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived on the land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.

belue berry.name: Belue Berry
belue berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.

cornn berry.name: Cornn Berry
cornn berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.

custap berry.name: Custap Berry
custap berry.description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a PokÃ©mon holds one, it will be able to move first just once when it&#8217;s in a pinch.

durin berry.name: Durin Berry
durin berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

enigma berry.name: Enigma Berry
enigma berry.description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a PokÃ©mon holds one, being hit by a supereffective attack will restore its HP.

jaboca berry.name: Jaboca Berry
jaboca berry.description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a physical attack hits the PokÃ©mon holding it, the attacker will also be hurt.

magost berry.name: Magost Berry
magost berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cuteness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

micle berry.name: Micle Berry
micle berry.description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a PokÃ©mon holds one, its accuracy will increase just once when it&#8217;s in a pinch.

nanab berry.name: Nanab Berry
nanab berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cuteness. Its pink flesh is sweet when eaten.

nomel berry.name: Nomel Berry
nomel berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Toughness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

pamtre berry.name: Pamtre Berry
pamtre berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.

rabuta berry.name: Rabuta Berry
rabuta berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

razz berry.name: Razz Berry
razz berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Coolness. Its red flesh is spicy when eaten.

rowap berry.name: Rowap Berry
rowap berry.description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a special attack hits the PokÃ©mon holding it, the attacker will also be hurt.

spelon berry.name: Spelon Berry
spelon berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cuteness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

watmel berry.name: Watmel Berry
watmel berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

wepear berry.name: Wepear Berry
wepear berry.description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness. Its green flesh is bitter when eaten.

blue scarf.name: Blue Scarf
blue scarf.description: An item to be held by a PokÃ©mon. During a contest, it raises the Beauty aspect of the PokÃ©mon holding it.

marshadium z.name: Marshadium Z
marshadium z.description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Marshadow&#8217;s Spectral Thief to an exclusive Z-Move.

mewnium z.name: Mewnium Z
mewnium z.description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Mew&#8217;s Psychic to an exclusive Z-Move.

pikashunium z.name: Pikashunium Z
pikashunium z.description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades a Thunderbolt by Pikachu in a cap to a Z-Move.

snorlium z.name: Snorlium Z
snorlium z.description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Snorlax&#8217;s Giga Impact to an exclusive Z-Move.
